sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card style="height: 200px;" color="#BF6211">
    <v-card-title class="text-h4 font-weight-black text-white mt-6 ml-4">商品推薦</v-card-title>
    <v-card-subtitle class="text-h6 font-weight-black text-white mt-4 ml-4">
      希望有你喜欢的商品
    </v-card-subtitle>
    <v-card-text>

    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>

  

  <v-card
      class="mx-auto"
      max-width="344"
      height="350px"
      v-for="(item, index) in list"
  >
    <v-img
        :src="'http://localhost:8081/queryGoodImg/'+item.id"
        height="200px"
        cover
    ></v-img>

    <v-card-title>
      {{item.name}}
    </v-card-title>

    <v-card-subtitle>
      {{ item.item }} ${{item.price}}
    </v-card-subtitle>

    <v-btn
        color="#f28f16"
        class="font-weight-black text-white mt-2 ml-4"
        plain
        @click="toDetail"
    >
      <v-icon>mdi-briefcase-search</v-icon>
      查看详情
    </v-btn>

  </v-card>



</template>

<script>
import {getRandomGood} from "../../../network/good";
import {onMounted, reactive, ref} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "ProductsFeatured",
  setup() {

    let list = ref([]);

    const getGood = () => {
      getRandomGood(6).then(res=>{
        list.value = res.data
      })
    }

    onMounted(()=>{
      getGood()
    })


    return {
      list,
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
